Reasoning: The paper discusses the citation advantage of open access in various subject areas, which is relevant to digital libraries (cs.DL), information retrieval (cs.IR), cryptography (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), and databases (cs.DB). Additionally, the use of Scopus database and DOAJ list suggests a focus on scholarly communication and publishing, which further supports the relevance to these sub-categories.
